name: Lumos (Asue, Oxalotte)
description:
Hello :)

Lumos is a 2D game made in 72 hours for the Arcade Controls Jam. The theme was "Swarms".

Your goal is to collect as many lights as possible while avoiding or killing enemies.

There is an online leaderboard system that only works on the Windows version.

Controls

ActionKeyboard / MouseGamepadMoveMouseLeft Stick
DashLeft Mouse ButtonAPauseEscapeStart

Team

-> Asue : game developer

-> Oxalotte : composed all the musics
